nodes.text: Horn's Future was a lightsaber crystal found in the galaxy during the Galactic Civil War.

Horn's Future first appeared in Star Wars Galaxies, a MMORPG released by Sony Online Entertainment in 2003. It was added to the game as part of the raid system in Hotfix 21.4. The crystal shares the name of Corran Horn, a Corellian Security Force officer and starfighter pilot who later became a Jedi in the New Jedi Order, but the game did not establish any connection between the two.
